Noshi LLC was formed in New York in early 2015 by Tomo Delaney and Pegi Gorelick. They met when Tomo volunteered to do friendly visiting with the elderly and was paired with Pegi's husband Ben, who had recently suffered a stroke. The three of them are fast friends and still meet every Friday. When they met Tomo was a stay at home dad to two picky eaters and he would often discuss this with Ben and Pegi. One day Pegi had a a lightbulb moment: Food Paint!

NOW®, a family owned company since 1968, offers more than 1,400 high-quality, clean and affordable products, including supplements, sports nutrition, functional foods, essential oils, and health and beauty products. NOW performs more than 16,000 in-house tests per month on its products, from raw ingredients to finished products, to ensure that what’s on the label is in the bottle. After more than 50 years in the natural products industry, NOW remains committed to its mission of providing value in products and services that empower people to lead healthier lives.

At NP Nutra®, we are passionate about health and this is the driving force behind our success. We research, source and supply only pure, potent ingredients. We care about every aspect of the business: the environment, the farmers, our manufacturing partners, our customers and the consumers who seek better health.

column5: QAI is a USDA-accredited organic certification company operating in the U.S., Canada, Latin America, European Union, and Japan. Founded in 1989, QAI helps producers and companies along the food supply chain to ensure organic integrity. QAI is owned by NSF International, which provides food and product safety and quality services including; Non-GMO certifications, Certified Plant-Based, Gluten-Free, Raised Without Antibiotics, Kosher, NSF/ANSI 305, GFSI and sustainability audits & certifications.

With today’s focus on human health and well-being, NSF meets the needs of safety and quality for the dietary supplements industry. NSF ensures product and ingredient safety, giving both industry and consumers peace of mind through GMP compliance, accredited certification programs, testing services and training capabilities.

column5: Numerator is a data and tech company bringing speed and scale to market research. Numerator blends first-party data from over 1 million US households with advanced technology to provide 360-degree consumer understanding for the market research industry that has been slow to change. Headquartered in Chicago, IL, Numerator has 2,000 employees worldwide; 80 of the top 100 CPG brands’ manufacturers are Numerator clients.

Founded in 1999 by brother and sister Ahmed Rahim and Reem Hassani, Numi Organic Tea is an award-winning social enterprise, founding B Corporation member, and leading purchaser of organic, Fair Trade teas distributed in more than 50 countries. Still family-owned and headquartered in Oakland, California, Numi supports community development projects both locally and internationally that create lasting positive impacts for people and the Earth. To date, Numi has contributed more than $1 million in Fair Trade Premiums in its tea farming communities. Numi’s Fair Trade and Fair Labor commitments have helped sponsor schools, hospitals, community centers, road construction and other improvements for living standards. Through plant-based and sustainable packaging, carbon offsets, and regenerative organic agriculture, Numi strives to create lasting positive impact for the planet and each other.
